metadata.title: CVE-2024-42121 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check index msg_id before read or write[WHAT]msg_id is used as an array index and it cannot be a negative value, andtherefore cannot be equal to MOD_HDCP_MESSAGE_ID_INVALID (-1).[HOW]Check whether msg_id is valid before reading and setting.This fixes 4 OVERRUN issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
